headline: UBS Cite Efficient Capital Allocation and Rising Profits in Viatris Inc. (VTRS) Upgrade
summary: Viatris Inc. (NASDAQ:VTRS) is among the 7 Cheap Pharmaceutical Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. The third stock on our list of cheap pharmaceutical stocks is Viatris Inc. (NASDAQ:VTRS). TheFly reported on February 9 that UBS upgraded VTRS to Buy from Neutral and raised the price target to $18 from $11. The company’s stronger […]
